select emp_code as empCode, team_code as teamCode, rank_code as rankCode, emp_id as empId, emp_name as empName, emp_phone as empPhone, emp_retire as empRetire, emp_date as empDate, dept_code as deptCode, (select fromEmp.read_count from tbl_chat_group fromEmp JOIN tbl_chat_group toEmp ON fromEmp.group_no = toEmp.group_no WHERE fromEmp.emp_code = e.emp_code AND toEmp.emp_code = #{empCode}) as readCount from tbl_emp e join tbl_team using(team_code) where emp_code is not null and emp_code != #{empCode}
select group_no from tbl_chat_group where emp_code in (#{from}, #{to}) group by group_no having count(emp_code) > 1
select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(seq_chat_group.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') from dual

select emp_code as empCode, group_no as groupNo, msg_gb as chatMsgGb, msg as chatMsg, file_name as chatFileName, file_path as chatFilePath, msg_date as chatDate, emp_name as empName from tbl_chat join tbl_emp using(emp_code) where group_no = #{groupNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chat ( chat_no, group_no, emp_code, msg_gb, msg, file_name, file_path, msg_date ) values( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') || LPAD(seq_chat.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{groupNo}, #{empCode}, #{chatMsgGb}, #{chatMsg}, #{chatFileName}, #{chatFilePath}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select emp_code as empCode, team_code as teamCode, rank_code as rankCode, emp_id as empId, emp_name as empName, emp_phone as empPhone, emp_retire as empRetire, emp_date as empDate, dept_code as deptCode, salary as salary, total_vacation as vacationTotal, use_vacation as vacationUse from tbl_emp join tbl_team using(team_code) join tbl_salary using(emp_code) join tbl_vacation_count using(emp_code) where emp_code is not null
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_daily_report ( report_date, emp_code, report_content ) values ( sysdate, #{empCode}, #{reportContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT report_date AS reportDate, emp_code AS empCode, report_content AS reportContent FROM tbl_daily_report WHERE report_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND emp_code = #{empCode}
select count(*) from tbl_daily_report where report_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE) and emp_code = #{empCode}

select alarm_no as alarmNo, alarm_comment as alarmComment, ref_url as refUrl, url_param as urlParam, alarm_read as alarmRead, alarm_date as alarmDate from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from tbl_alarm where emp_code = #{empCode} order by alarm_date desc ) a ) where rnum between 1 and 10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_check ( att_date, emp_code, check_in ) values ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{empCode}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') )
mapper.select: select att_date as attDate, emp_code as empCode, check_in as onWork, check_out as offWork, check_note as checkNote from tbl_check where att_date = #{day} and emp_code = #{empCode}

select emp_code as empCode, team_code as teamCode, rank_code as rankCode, emp_id as empId, emp_pw as empPw, emp_name as empName, emp_phone as empPhone, emp_retire as empRetire, emp_date as empDate, dept_code as deptCode from tbl_emp join tbl_team using(team_code) where emp_code = #{empCode}
